Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Besaka tuhada raba janada hai ki tusim lagabhaga do ti'ahi rata jam adhi rata jam ika ti'ahi rata (namaza la'i) khare hude ho ate ika varaga tuhade sathi'am vicom vi. Ate alaha hi rata ate dina da paimanam tai'a karada hai. Usa ne jani'am hai ki tusim usa nu pura nahim kara sakoge. Ate usa ne tuhade upara kirapa kiti hai huna kura'ana vicom parho jinha tuhanu saukha lage. Usa ne jani'a hai ki tuhade vicom rogi honage ate kine loka alaha di khoja vica dharati te safara karanage ate duje ajihe loka vi honage jihare alaha de raha vica jihada karanage. Tam isa kura'ana vicom karo. Ate alaha nu karaza devo, vadhi'a karaza. Ate jihari neki tusim age bhejoge usa nu alaha de kola hazira dekhauge. Uha utama hai ate puna vica vadha hai. Alaha tom mu'afi magom besaka alaha mu'afa karana vala rahima vala hai
ate apane raba di vadi'a'i bi'ana kara
Ate apane kapari'am nu pavitara rakha
ate ajiha na karo, ki upakara karo ate fala di icha bahuti rakho
Ate apane raba la'i dhiraja rakho
Tam uha bahuta sakhata dina hovega
Mainu chada devo ate usa bade nu vi jisa nu saim ikala paida kita hai
Ate usa nu bahuta sara mala dita
Ate hara tar'ham da samana unham la'i hazira kara dita hai
Phira uha lalasa rakhada hai ki maim usa nu hora denva
Kade vi nahim, uha meri'am a'itam da virodhi hai
Jaladi hi maim usa nu ika aukhi carha'i te carhanvanga
